item.description:

item.title: Street Lights out, 15th July
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam RE: Failure of Street Lighting Provision in Elgin Avenue, Maida Vale, London W9 I reside at 74 Elgin Avenue, Maida Vale, London W9 2HD. Upon returning home one evening three weeks ago, I noticed that the lampposts nearest to my flat were no longer illuminating our stretch of pavement. For unaccompanied women in particular, walking home in central London at night it is an unsettling experience when street lights malfunction and parts of our route home are plunged into darkness. I can not see what I am treading in! The property becomes more vulnerable too. Please ask your maintenance staff to make the necessary repairs to these lampposts as a matter of urgency? If you need anything further from me, you can reach me by email at sandra@pricesbackclinic.com or via my mobile, 07956 327652. I look forward to hearing from you soon. Sincerely, Sandra Price

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Elgin Avenue, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet
